resources.string: This service tests how well your game adapts to Huawei devices and provides gameplay data to optimize versions for upcoming release. Early access data will also be used as an important reference for rating games and allocating promotion resources. Therefore, it is strongly recommended that you perform early access on the game.The early access application process is as follows.

string.name: txt_earlyaccess_click
string.a: Click here to learn more about Early Access.
